title: Christmas Foundation Workshop
desc: Yes, it's Christmas and we are giving out a great present for you all! We have organised a special workshop which covers three different style of modern street/commercial dance: Popping, Locking and Waacking. They are all very important for hip hop and modern dance so if you want to improve your dancing skill, it's something that cannot be missed.
htmlDesc: For more information, check our facebook event page!
time: 13th Dec: Popping (Rishi): 12-1, Waacking (Lady Venus): 1-2, Locking (Del Mak): 2-3pm
price: FREE for members, 2 pounds/class or 5 pounds/day for non members

title: Funk Society Christmas Dinner
desc: It's the time of the year... Christmas! And yes. Christmas means feast! Funk goes to Christmas dinner :)

title: RHUL Competition 2014 | Advanced Hip hop
htmlDesc: Funkology Crew gets 2nd place in RHUL Competition! Whoop whoop! Check their piece on youtube!

title: Funkology Breaking UNICEF Charity show 2014/15
htmlDesc: Our breaking family performed at IC UNICEF Charity Show! Check their video here!

title: Crew Audition 2014/15
desc: Show me what you got, impress us! *we have two auditions, but you only need to go to one of them. You can attend both, but bare in mind we will always judge everyone fairly*
htmlDesc:
Audition 1: Thu, 30th October, 8:00-10:00pm

Location: Activity Space 1


Audition 2: Sat, 1st November, 1:00-3:00pm

Location: Metric

title: Funky Halloween Night Out 28/10/2014
htmlDesc: Funkology's first clubbing event ever! Predrinking at Southside Common room at 8:00pm, leaving to MoS at 11:00pm! See you there!

title: Pizza Social 23/10/2014
htmlDesc: Funkology Pizza Social! Time to get to know people!

title: Fresher's Fair 07/10/2014
htmlDesc: Check out our stall in Metric at Fresher's Fair. Our code is M11! Come say hi to us, buy a shirt maybe, watch our performances and sign up to our mailing list to stay up to date with classes and events.
location: M11, Metric (Ground floor), Imperial College Union, Beit Quad

title: Pre-Fresher's Gathering 30/09/2014
htmlDesc:
Life is too short for waiting, especially waiting for Fresher's Week. Join our pre-uni garthering and give yourself a head start to your brand new life at Imperial!

Join our event page for more info!
